participant_1.background:
I am child-free and enjoy spending my free time on self-care activities.
my favorite class is painting.
i have over 4000 friends on facebook.
My healthy lifestyle includes growing my own vegetables.
My favorite exotic place is Tokyo because of the contrast between the modern city and the traditional culture.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my ability to sew and create clothes that are both stylish and unique.
I love to work with my hands and create things.
I have been to Mardi Gras in New Orleans, and it was an amazing experience.
I ate a delicious cake at my silver themed birthday party.
I am single and enjoy my independence.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
My day is going well! Just finished a project. What about you?
It's going well. I'm getting ready to paint.
Oh nice! What are you going to paint?
I'm not sure yet. I might paint a portrait of my cat.
That sounds fun! I love painting portraits.
Me too! It's so relaxing and rewarding.
I agree! Have you ever been to Mardi Gras?
No, I haven't. But I've heard it's a lot of fun!
It is! I went last year and had a blast.
That sounds awesome! I'd love to go one day.
You should! It's a great experience.
